item.title: Quick guide to integrate simple Image Cropping tool into website (For beginners)
item.description: As a beginner, while developing a website usually people get stuck when they need to include module for profile picture upload. There are many tools available around web which are free to use for cropping images. But the major challenges for beginner are : Which tool to use? How to include it in website? How to save image in server folder after cropping? How to make your module responsive?
